### getAnalysisUsage() {#a1f7a99b42cdfd0cf468d8963f557fe15}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PPCLoopInstrFormPrep.cpp&#125;::PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

### prepareBaseForDispFormChain() {#a0b390b7d6f0524d2eafd390cd1427f97}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForDispFormChain (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp; BucketChain, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/#ace83c0b2fc7de869e3b41692c29c0fda">PrepForm</a> Form)</>}>
Prepare for one chain <code>BucketChain</code>, find the best base element and update all other elements in <code>BucketChain</code> accordingly.

<code>Form</code> is used to find the best base element. If success, best base element must be stored as the first element of <code>BucketChain</code>. Return false if no base element found, otherwise return true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp/#l00307">307</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp">PPCLoopInstrFormPrep.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### prepareBaseForUpdateFormChain() {#acefaf61a2d69796e198b22226306d4e3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForUpdateFormChain (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp; BucketChain)</>}>
Prepare for one chain <code>BucketChain</code>, find the best base element and update all other elements in <code>BucketChain</code> accordingly.

If success, best base element must be stored as the first element of <code>BucketChain</code>. Return false if no base element found, otherwise return true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp/#l00314">314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp">PPCLoopInstrFormPrep.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### prepareBasesForCommoningChains() {#a660c93b866af83a04d29d03b67e3eef4}

<MemberDefinition

### SuccPrepCount {#a45551aac6d2739298245e89f823b16f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PPCLoopInstrFormPrep.cpp&#125;::PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::SuccPrepCount</>}>
Successful preparation number for Update/DS/DQ form in all inner most loops.

One successful preparation will put one common base out of loop, this may leads to register presure like LICM does. Make sure total preparation number can be controlled by option.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp/#l00254">254</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp">PPCLoopInstrFormPrep.cpp</a>.
